DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of all responses by an individual to the Additional Concerns domain of the FACT-Hep Questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G developed specifically for evaluating quality of life of patients with hepatobiliary cancer (liver, bile duct and pancreas)._Added; extra; further._A matter of interest or importance._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G developed specifically for evaluating quality of life of patients with hepatobiliary cancer (liver, bile duct and pancreas).

Concepts.definition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G questionnaire developed specifically for evaluating quality of life of patients with hepatobiliary cancer (liver, bile duct and pancreas).

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the subscale score for the Additional Concerns section of a FACIT or FACT questionnaire.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Versioned to support generic use of the VD with Additional Concerns FACIT or FACT subscale score.
